name: Designing for energy-efficient, low-carbon commercial buildings
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session covers low carbon building design imperatives such as responsible sourcing, embodied carbon calculations, technology integration, landscape design, and human behaviour. Case studies demonstrate the latest thinking.

presentations.name: Designing for low carbon offices: clients’ perspectives
presentations.speakers: Sarah Cary, Sustainable Developments Executive, British Land

presentations.name: Designing for low carbon hotels
presentations.speakers: James Dilley, Associate director, Jestico + Whiles

presentations.name: Wakefield One – Sustainable Civic Offices
presentations.speakers: Peter Cartwright, Director, Cartwright Picard Architects
